name: Enhanced PeerTube
description: An improved PeerTube plugin supporting multiple instances with diverse content discovery
author: Enhanced by AI Assistant due to this not being worth my time

settings.name: Primary Instance URL
settings.description: The main PeerTube instance to use (without https://)

settings.name: Additional Instances
settings.description: Comma-separated list of additional PeerTube instances (without https://)

settings.name: Content Mix Ratio
settings.description: How much content to fetch from each instance (1-10 videos per instance)

settings.name: Show Remote Videos
settings.description: Include videos from other instances that are federated

settings.name: Preferred Languages
settings.description: Comma-separated language codes (en,fr,de,es,etc.) or 'all' for any language

settings.name: Random Instance Discovery
settings.description: Automatically discover and use random PeerTube instances from the public directory for maximum content diversity

settings.name: Enable Random Instances
settings.description: Discover and use random PeerTube instances from the public list

settings.name: Random Instance Count
settings.description: Number of random instances to discover and use (1-10)

settings.name: Instance Health Filter
settings.description: Only use instances that are healthy and responsive

settings.name: Cache Random Instances
settings.description: Cache discovered instances for better performance (30 minute cache)
